name: SMACK
description:
This game was made for the curdle game jam Nr.22. It sadly wasn't finished on time due to file corruption. The good news is that I fixed the problem, fixed some issues and now it is out! Enjoy! And please leave Feedback too!

STORY:

You are a protagonist who needs to SMACK beans for some reason...

CONTROLS:

WASD or arrow keys to move (wasd preferd) Space to jump. Mouse to look around.

Left click to smack enemy. Kill the Enemys with your Bat. Right click to pick up enemy, then left click to throw it or right click to drop it. Tip: Before the corpse bar (yellow HP bar on enemys) hits zero, throw them on other enemys to kill them!

Press E to interact with things. The rest is on the board. Have fun!

LINKS:

Wheatbale channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC4arN7VzHRY2QKogvaKnGsA

Gameplay video: Coming soon!
